name: Khanda
description: A blade sharp enough to slice through magic itself.

abilities.name: Empower Spell
abilities.description: The next unit targeted ability the wielder casts deals additional magical damage in a separate instance, and debuffs the target, slowing their movement speed and breaking their passive abilities.
notes: Shares cooldowns with Phylactery. If both items are present, the older one takes priority.
Affects most offensive unit-targeted ability casts, except Item abilities, Death Pact, Holy Persuasion, Ion Shell, Enchant, Devour, and Reflected abilities.
If the ability's target turns invulnerable, or if Spell Block triggers, Empower Spell will not trigger.
The order of damage and debuff application depends on the target health when receiving target spell.
If the target's health is above 250, Empower Spell's effects get applied before the triggering ability's effects.
If the target's health below or equal to 250, the triggering ability's effects get before Empower Spell's effects.

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
96 mana, 0.4 mana regeneration and 0.8% flat base magic resistance.
8 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes.
10.8 main attack damage to universal heroes.
